body: Certified masterpiece 11/10 👌💦
why didn’t he just end up with the other girl LOL. poor kid the ntr plot really ruined it.

And don't you dare say that Aijirou is just a "sexual prop," like a human dildo whose sole purpose is to serve as a tool to inflict pain on Haruchi. She doesn't treat Aijirou like that. She treats him like a lover, and not once is it implied that any other servant could perform the same role. He's not replaceable. He and Asana are connected on an intimate level while Haruchi has so little emotional connection with her that he begins to question if she still loves him. That's how love-deprived and miserable he is. All he knows is pain and the dopamine hit that is released to counteract that pain. Can you really call this consent? I fap to rape and ryona, so it would be hypocritical for me to tell you not to fap to this. Just don't try to rationalize and pass this as a healthy S/M relationship.

Does it matter that she gave him a safe word? Is it really "consent" when the person lacks the mental faculties to process the harm being done to them? This guy is clearly a hostage of his own feelings towards this woman, and in the end she can't even utter the words "I love you." That kiss in the last page isn't a gesture of love. It's just her way of shutting him up without having to confront how she actually feels about him. Her heart has a place that will forever be reserved for the butler. She has achieved a level of happiness that could never be achieved with Haruchi alone, and that's what stings. One safe word is all it would take to take that happiness away from her, because Haruchi isn't enough as a partner.

on pg74, it seems the safe word to end the NTRing wa "kamidouzono", but the MC never used it. He was definitely enjoying the situation regardless of his "stop" comments. Even as early as pg60, you can see hints of his true nature. It's safe to conclude that the male MC has a fetish of seeing the person he loves get fucked by another dude, and i guess he ends up realizing this on pg75.
Honestly would've been a 9-10/10 if it wasnt for the NTR near the end. It just kinda ruined it for me, 4/10.
